findings.title: BT - Burns Tokens
findings.description: The sum of balances does not always equal the total supply, and the private keys of the owner's account are not properly managed.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: Unused state variables can create clutter and increase deployment costs.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: Unnecessary boolean equalities can make the code less clear.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Incorrect order of operations can lead to incorrect results.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: Transfers should be checked for success according to the ERC20 specification.

findings.title: TSD - Potential abuse of burn functionality by the owner
findings.description: Potential abuse of burn functionality by the owner, leading to token loss for users.

findings.title: TSD - Centralized ownership can lead to potential hacks
findings.description: Centralized ownership can lead to potential hacks.
